title: Secretary General of the Colombo Plan calls on President Rajapaksa
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Chandana Perera) The Secretary General of the Colombo Plan Ms. Dato Patricia Yoon-Moi Chia paid a courtesy call on President Mahinda Rajapaksa at the Temple Trees this morning on 10 August. During the brief meeting with the President, Ms Dato Chia explained the current role of the…
